Would be nice to mention #bitcoin-dev for general bitcoin development?\n

> Would be nice to mention #bitcoin-dev for general bitcoin development?

Maybe, although that's really the domain for other resources (like the wiki, bitcoin.org, etc that refer to the entire network), not our project documentation.
Avoid prior mistakes:  Write one sentence to describe what is on-topic for the channel.\n
ACK.\nNot sure if it needs a textline of what it on-/off topic (Bitcoin-core-dev sounds after a good topic).\n

OK, in `doc/README.md` under resources I've split out 'project-specific development' and 'general bitcoin development'. I'm not sure what is the place to go into more detail about what is on- and off topic, maybe a link in the topic of the channel itself.\n
Eh, when did this change? #bitcoin-dev has always been open to discussion of Bitcoin development, including Core, Electrum, etc...\n
